abstract: New York Yankees pitcher C C Sabathia, following recovery from groin injury, is set to return to rotation in team's upcoming game against Oakland Athletics; many of Sabathia's family members will attend game, which is being played in his hometown of Vallejo, Calif.
lead_paragraph: Manager Joe Girardi has had to keep his fingers crossed when it comes to his starters, who have been plagued by injuries and inconsistent efforts.

headline.main: Key Piece to Yankees’ Pitching Puzzle, C.C. Sabathia, Returns

snippet: Manager Joe Girardi has had to keep his fingers crossed when it comes to his starters, who have been plagued by injuries and inconsistent efforts.
